name: Quaternions - the most 'evil' system of describing rotations
name_original: Quaternions - the most 'evil' system of describing rotations
description:
Many mathematicians called quaternions 'evil' because they thought they were unnecessary for describing 3d rotations. Basically, they are a four-dimensional number system that can describe a 3-dimensional number system. Avoid existential ghouls of gimbal lock and question your existence .
